## Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
A clear and concise description of what the problem is.

## Describe the solution you'd like
Detail the change, new algorithm, visualization, or documentation you expect.

## Describe alternatives you've considered
List any alternative approaches or workarounds you've tried.

## Additional context
Screenshots, references, or links that explain the idea further.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have searched existing issues/PRs to avoid duplicates.
- [ ] I am willing to implement this feature (optional).
